nodes.title: Rewrite for more Emojis, modularity and performance
Dispatch Event manually when toggling EmojiPopup
Add SNAPSHOT repository explanation to README
Private member access between outer and inner classes
Guard against null values in EmojiPopup.Builder
Android 24. Split v4 + support lib 24.2.0. Gradle 2.14.1 & Android Studio 2.1.3
Fix Resource for About xml file
Remove Global Layout listener when dismissing the popup. Fixes #22
Update Android Tools Build Gradle to 2.1.0
Show People category first when no recent emojis are present
Add Library resource config file. Fixes #6
Make README better (better screenshots and adding Example)
Use soft references to hold sprites
Allow to override background, icon and divider colors
Add support to AutoCompleteTextView and MultiAutoCompleteTextView
Use Gradle Maven Publish Plugin for publishing.
Update Code Quality Tools to 0.10.0, Detekt to 1.0.0-RC7 & ktlint to 0.23.1
Introduce EmojiEditTextInterface which allows custom EditText to work with the Popup.
Expose instance so that can access replaceWithImages from external package
Add release method which releases the sheet but not the data structure
Add missing verifyInstalled to the EmojiManager
Update emojis and use sprite sheet instead of individual images
Expose some API so that the library can also be used with other systems such as React.
Update PMD to 6.0.0 & CPD Gradle Plugin to 1.1
Remove duplicates from Checkstyle configuration file.
Update dependencies to latest & clean up Gradle files.
Fix for emoji keyboard UI artifact (while fast scrolling)
Update JUnit Jacoco Gradle Plugin to 0.9.0
Add infrastructure to let the provider perform emoji span replacements and utilize in emoji-google-compat
Updated context for Nougat and newer devices
Let Emoji provide a drawable in addition to the resource id.
Don't clean build again when deploying SNAPSHOTS.
Let Gradle install all of the Android dependencies.
Update Code Quality Tools Plugin to 0.5.0
Avoid scrolling the emoji grid after opening the variant popup
Update Android Studio Gradle Build Tools to 2.3.3
Reflect Emoji Skin Tone automatically in Emoji List.
Also don't generate BuildConfig for Emoji Vendors.
Pull out EmojiRange to package level.
EmojiUtils: Add some documentation to public methods and clean a few things up.
Latest skin tone is remembered as new default
Add back Emoji Size and use line height as the default.
Don't generate BuildConfig file for release builds.
Add fastlane screengrab to capture screenshots automatically.
Add night theme support to sample and library.
Add new twitter module and clean up gradle files
Update everything to latest and use Java 8 with AS 3.0.0 alpha.
Support for skin tones in the picker
Minor improvements for the generator doc
Adjust Coding style of generated java classes.
Disable publish action in forked repository.
EmojiEditText cursor height is too small by wirting emojis followed by text fixes #492
added  property to Emoji class to be used for pattern matching purposes
Only construct RecentEmojiManager if one hasn’t already been set
minSdk 21, targetSdk 29 & update all of the dependencies
Fix hardcoded text not displaying Emojis correctly
Add duplicate support for Emoji start with variant selector.
Add license headers to JS/KT/Java files.
Call EmojiPopup#start() when rootView is already laid out.
Multiple Emoji Popups in one Activity.
Add SingleEmojiTrait to force single (replaceable) on an EditText
Delay opening of the popup to correctly align with window insets. Fixes #400
up to new beta version    material:1.1.0-alpha10   ->   material:1.1.0-beta01
Add image loader interface & Coil implementation
Fix set popup window height method
RecentEmojiManager: Increase max emoji count to 100.
Automatically call start and stop when attaching/detaching EmojiPopup
Add emoji-material module for material bindings.
Fix keyboard calculation for API v21+ by introducing start/stop into EmojiPopup
Fix dialog calculations & issues with re-opening emoji keyboard
Don't use bundled AppCompat emojis. Instead download the font.
Support use case where only Emoji Dialog should be shown.
Allow popup height to be changed with a setter
Added proper documentation for latest gradle builds and syntax
Optimise the category png's to save some space
Content descriptors added for supporting talkback accessibility
Content descriptors added for supporting talkback accessibility
Add disclaimer about instantiating the EmojiPopup early to the README
Show duplicate emojis in the input but not in the picker
Fix Emoji keyboard in certain cases
Fix Layout issues in EmojiDialog for several edge cases.
Nuke EmojiEditTextInterface and allow any kind of EditText to be passed.
Add attrs for color customization on theme level
Remove sudo: false from travis config.
use EditText for builder popup instead of EmojiEditText
Upgrade Jimp to 0.5.0, remove manual promises
﻿Fix a crash when context instanceof ContextThemeWrapper
